name: Liberitas
description:
Heavily inspired by the author Shaun Tan with books like The Red Tree and The Lost Thing, Liberitas aims to be the videogame version of that. Mimicking a children's book with pull tabs, solve puzzles to progress the story page by page. Explore how to cope with depression in a healthy way and, ultimately, how to beat it.
